name: Kristian Kersting
content: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Lab @ TU Darmstadt Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning Lab TU Darmstadt We advance statistical learning, probabilistic reasoning, and collaborative intelligence to enable systems that can understand complex worlds and act responsibly. Explore research Meet the team Teaching Research Topics Our work spans statistical relational AI, generative modeling, and trustworthy ML systems in close collaboration with cognitive science, robotics, and domain experts. People We are computer scientists, cognitive scientists, and engineers working across TU Darmstadt, Hessian.AI, and international partners. Meet the team that drives our research agenda. Teaching We offer core courses in machine learning and artificial intelligence, hands-on seminars, and supervision for bachelor and master theses. Thesis supervision is available for TU Darmstadt students only. Thesis Opportunities We supervise Bachelor and Master theses on multiple topics in the direction of AI & ML. Please read the instructions below. Supervision is only possible for students of the TU Darmstadt. Language: English or German • Credits: 12 or 30 CP depending on programme Open instructionsâ Publications Browse our peer-reviewed publications. Use the filters to discover our contributions across conferences, journals, and workshops.
